Package com.streamline.communicate

Class ResponseParser

java.lang.Object
com.streamline.communicate.ResponseParser
public class ResponseParser extends Object
Parse API responses from Invidious and validate JSON strings.
Author:
wellatleastitried

    • listFromInvidiousSearchResponse

      public static List<Song> listFromInvidiousSearchResponse(String jsonResponse)
      Parse the incoming JSON response into a List of Song.
      Parameters:
      jsonResponse - The JSON response from the API in String format.
      Returns:
      The List of Song for the backend to manage.

    • isValidJson

      public static boolean isValidJson(String jsonString)
      Validate whether the incoming string is valid JSON.
      Parameters:
      jsonString - The string needing validation.
      Returns:
      True if the string is valid JSON, False otherwise.

    • searchResultToSong

      public static Song searchResultToSong(VideoSearchResult toConvert)
      Parse the JSON object VideoSearchResult into a Song object.
      Parameters:
      toConvert - The VideoSearchResult object to convert.
      Returns:
      The Song object with the attributes of the VideoSearchResult.

    • urlFromInvidividualVideoResponse

      public static String urlFromInvidividualVideoResponse(String jsonResponse)
      Retrieves the best audio URL from the passed JSON response. This method prioritizes mp4 audio files.
      Parameters:
      jsonResponse - The JSON response to parse for the URLs.
      Returns:
      The audio URL for the given song with the best quality.
